Package com.rutaji.exaqua.Fluids

Class MyLiquidTank

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.templates.FluidTank
com.rutaji.exaqua.Fluids.MyLiquidTank
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.IFluidHandler, net.minecraftforge.fluids.IFluidTank
public class MyLiquidTank extends net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.templates.FluidTank
Stores fluid in tile entities. These tile entities implement IMyLiquidTankTile.

    • getCapabilityProvider

      public net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilityProvider getCapabilityProvider()
      Returns WaterFluidTankCapabilityAdapter that translates this class into IFluidTank and IFluidHandler from Forge. Used for comunication with other mods.
      Returns:
      WaterFluidTankCapabilityAdapter wrapped around this energy storage.

      Returns:
      true, if storage is full.

    • GetFullness

      public float GetFullness()
      Returns:
      number from 0 to 1 representing how full the storage is. 0 is empty. 1 is full.

    • onContentsChanged

      public void onContentsChanged()
      Called every time stored fluid changes by setEnergy. Executes OnChange to send change to a client.
